__IMTHOOK__.label: My WhatsApp Business Cloud Events webhook

messages.content: You are a business owner named Vrinda running an AI product business. Write a polite and suitable reply to the customer query: '{{1.messages[].text.body}}'. Start the reply with "Hi{{1.contacts[].profile.name}},"  if customer name is available, or a polite generic greeting if not). Briefly mention that your business specializes in innovative AI solutions for automation and data analysis. Inform the customer that you will contact them within 2 days to discuss their specific needs. The reply must end with "Thanks, Karima". Generate only the message text.

spec.help: Configuration of the parameters that the function accepts.
spec.name: parameters
spec.label: Parameters

nested.help:
The URL must be publicly accessible. To test this, you can try opening the URL in an anonymous tab. It must take you directly to the file.
Ensure that the URL is not restricted from automated access. This can involve external platform settings, proxy bot-blocking, and robots.txt configuration.
nested.name: file_uri
nested.label: File URL
